title: High Street Retail – Downtown Columbus
description: Prime retail space on High Street in the heart of downtown Columbus. High-traffic location with excellent visibility and pedestrian foot traffic. Ideal for restaurant, café, or flagship retail. Full build-out flexibility and on-site parking available.

title: Polaris Industrial Warehouse & Distribution
description: Class A industrial warehouse in the Polaris submarket. 125,000 SF with 32' clear height, multiple dock positions, and drive-in doors. Excellent highway access to I-71 and I-270. Ideal for distribution, manufacturing, or last-mile logistics.

title: Arena District Class A Office
description: Full floor or multi-floor opportunity in a premier Arena District high-rise. Stunning views, modern finishes, and walkable access to dining, entertainment, and Nationwide Arena. Building amenities include fitness center, conference facilities, and structured parking.

title: Grandview Heights Multifamily – 24 Units
description: Stabilized 24-unit multifamily asset in desirable Grandview Heights. Strong in-place rents and low turnover. Walking distance to Grandview Avenue retail and dining. Opportunity for value-add or hold for yield.

title: Grove City Land – Development Opportunity
description: 15.5-acre development site with frontage on Hoover Road and strong visibility from I-71. Zoned for commercial/retail. Utilities at street. Ideal for retail pad development, medical office, or mixed-use. Grove City is one of the fastest-growing submarkets in Central Ohio.

title: Sawmill Road Retail – 8% Cap Rate
description: Stabilized single-tenant retail building on Sawmill Road. Strong credit or established local tenant. 8% cap rate. Ideal for investors seeking yield in a high-traffic Columbus corridor. Assumable financing may be available.
